name: Le Chateau de Beaulieu

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed just one night to celebrate our wedding anniversary and we couldn't have chosen a better spot. The chateau is extremely comfortable but the real reason to come here is the restaurant. We've been lucky enough to visit a number of very highly regarded restaurants in the UK, Europe and the US and for us this experience was right up there among the best of them.
reviews.title: A fabulous anniversary treat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was surprised by the previous reviewer's reference to rude restaurant staff? On the contrary, all absolutely delightful, including the sommelier who introduced us to some amazing wines that we would never have chosen ourselves but that complemented the food beautifully. We loved it.
reviews.title: what a shame

aka: Le Chateau De Beaulieu Hotel Busnes
